page.title: 11Religion
page.content: St Andrews church was built in the fouteenth century,the first vicar was the Rev Cordeux who wished to be burried as close to the church as possible.The original church was built in 1295 on one acre of ground close to the river but that fell into decay and the present church was built as it is now in open fields a quarter of a mile from the village of Paull. We carried out a cencu and found out that most of the village population is Church of England although we could not tell exactly as there were not many people who bothered to fill in the census forms.We found out that there are ten Mormons in our area, three Jehovahs Witnesses,eight Anglican Catholics,six Roman Catholics,twelve Methodists,and five people said that they were agnostics.
